Name: A True Arena Champion
Description: You encountered an Exile attacked by Tacet Discords. After witnessing your capabilities, he seeks for you aid.
QuestDesc: You encountered an Exile attacked by Tacet Discords. After witnessing your capabilities, he seeks for you aid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A new face, huh? You skinny, twig-like figure understands the real deal about fighting?

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You didn't drag yourself all the way here to play babysitter for that outdated principle of the old fool, did ya?

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You still have the chance to back out, heehee! Don't come crying like a little baby in the pit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Smiling Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi there? Are you here to participate in the Seaside Arena too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Smiling Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One more competitor here, and my heart is just breaking with guilt.

Dialogues.Speaker: Smiling Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've never, ever lost, you know? Best of luck to you, though. You'll need it, trust me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here's your entry pass. Now you can come and leave the camp freely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you find out any useful information?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, all the participants are elite members of their factions, and the competition only fuels their aggressiveness with each round.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, before the match kicks off, we need to contribute items to the prize pool.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, do you have anything valuable?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries! I'll throw in my stuff. I have faith in you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've staked everything I own, even a 20th-anniversary limited-edition comic book with the author's autograph.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the prized issue number 0001.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! Are you undervaluing them? They cost me a great sum!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll hand them over to the organizer. You go register with the receptionist. I'll be your biggest cheerleader during the match!

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, are you here to register for the Seaside Arena?

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's a new rule to follow. If you want to register for the match, you need to collect three badges first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Participants in the Seaside Arena have always been the cream of the crop.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Due to the enticing rewards, many incompetents try to sneak in, wasting everyone's time. That's why we've set up this rule—to ensure only the truly powerful can participate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To earn these badges, you'll undergo three basic trials. Are you ready?

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The first trial tests your courage. A weapon is placed at the highest point in the camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you can retrieve it safely, you'll earn the first badge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excellent. Overcoming inner fears is the first step to climbing to the top.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've earned the badge of courage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The next badge represents speed. Wait a moment; someone is challenging it now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, your turn. See those shooting targets?

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your task is to hit those targets within two minutes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only those who react fast and make swift decisions can pass.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're the one we're expecting, I'm sure you can breeze through it. If you're ready, let's get started.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Efficient and clean. Come take your badge of speed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The final trial is the most challenging.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, here you are! Seems like you're ready.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can find Exiles from various factions here. To maintain order, we're required to have an entry pass to prove our identity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll get an entry pass for you. For now, you can explore around the camps. Maybe you can find some information about the opponent.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here you are. It's your second badge. As for the final badge…

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You'll undergo a comprehensive trial.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, the examiner's schedule is reversed from ours.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You'll find her only at dusk.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The food lately is getting worse and worse. What's up? Need something?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm here to get the final badge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Another foolish challenger from a foolish faction, huh? If you don't want to lose everything you have, head back now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Regret is still an option. We can pretend we never saw you. Hurry up and leave!

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Want the last badge? Look at how weak and fragile you are. Just leave if you don't want to get your faction in trouble.

Options.PlotLineKey: I promised someone I would win.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My ears are tired of hearing such promises. Anyway, I've already given you a chance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The last badge represents strength, so you need to take me down to get it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy, right? Okay, give it a try, kid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Congratulations on collecting all three badges. An Exile claiming to be your friend has already completed the registration form on your behalf.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before entering the match, please familiarize yourself with the Seaside Arena rules.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your friend forgot to provide Echo information for you. Unfortunately, once the registration form is submitted, no changes are allowed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to the Seaside Arena rules, challengers who haven't registered Echo information will be provided with an assistance Echo in battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hahaha, unfortunately, it's Zig Zag, an ordinary Tacet Discord. To avoid affecting the match, we can only provide the basic Echo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here are the rules.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Seaside Arena adopts a single-elimination system. Participants are allowed to use any fighting styles in battle. The winner automatically advances to the next round.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you win all three rounds, you qualify for challenging the previous champion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you ready, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Receptionist
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wish you good luck!

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The final's approaching. I'm still not sure how they manage to defeat their opponents.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, you'd better focus on your opponent's movements during the battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be watching. If anything goes wrong, I'll help you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, you were amazing in the matches! That's the Rover I know!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After this season, The Hyenas will slowly reclaim its status.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so excited to share this good news with the old leader!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On my way here, I encountered several high-ranked factions that seemed ready to leave. They eyed me with disdain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now it's their turn to feel the pain I've endured!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, don't give me that look. Can't you tell it's just a joke?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zeyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, Rover, is your payment. Hope to see you again soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All the chaos has come to an end. Why the long face?

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me guess. You fear that the one you helped is actually a fierce and greedy wolf.

Options.PlotLineKey: How do you know what I'm thinking?

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can tell from your expression. You're not an Exile, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It doesn't matter if they're wolves or not. Think carefully about why you chose to lend them a hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You helped them not to boost their status or gain more advantages but to restore the Seaside Arena to its intended purpose—a place where everyone can enjoy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You played a part in changing the twisted rules of this region.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your gave the weak a chance to survive, and that's commendable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This region is on the brink of a new wave of changes. Whether they're positive or negative depends on the response of the people here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's no longer your concern, so don't dwell on what you did. Let's wait and see what answers they'll give.

Options.PlotLineKey: I think I understand what you mean.

Dialogues.Speaker: Training Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been stuck here for so long. It's time to break free and stretch my stiff bones. See you, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As promised, I've granted your requests. It won't be long before the Seaside Arena reverts to being an arena for participants to sharpen their skills.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can't wait to see the day when it's once again exploited as a negotiating table, hahaha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wolves in the forest always prey on sheep, even if they are aware hunters might shoot them. It's their nature, unchangeable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If there's nothing else, I'm taking my leave.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gladiator Champion
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here are the spoils of your victories. All yours now.
